Decatur.Roosevelt Junior High School (Decatur, I: Roosevelt Junior High School is a historic school located at 701 West Grand Avenue in Decatur, Illinois. Built from 1917 to 1921, the school was the second exclusive middle school in the city behind the now closed Centennial Junior High School. Decatur architectural firm Brooks, Bramhall12174130110 & Dague designed the school in the Collegiate Gothic style, a popular choice for educational buildings at the time.
